info.en:
Location of Nodes
Beijing, Tokyo

Server Configuration:
Technical standards and total estimated hardware expenditure by the end of 3rd June, 2018:
Amazon EC2AWS m4.4xlarge
CPU: 16 Core 
RAM: 64GB
SSD: 512GB
Total Expenditure：$817 per month

The plan for expanding hardware capacity after 3rd June, 2018:
Amazon EC2AWS x1e.32xlarge
CPU: 128 Core
RAM: 3904G
SSD: 2 x 1900GB (The storage can be expanded based on specific demands)
Broadband Speed: 25 Gbps
Number of Nodes: 2 (one livenet, one standby)

Group Introduction:
EOS ONO is a free and decentralized social network Dapp to be issued on EOS platform, which respects and protects the diversity of human interactions.

Find us:

info.zh_CN:
节点位置
Beijing, Tokyo

服务器配置
截至2018年6月3日的技术规格和资源总支出估算：
Amazon EC2AWS m4.4xlargeCPU：16 CoreRAM：64GBSSD：512G​​B
总费用：每月817美元
2018年6月3日之后的硬件估算扩展计划：
Amazon EC2AWS x1e.32xlargeCPU：128 CoreRAM：3904GSSD：2 x 1900GB（磁盘容量根据需要增加）网络：25 Gbps节点：共2个节点（1个livenet，1个备用）

团队介绍
我们是EOS ONO，一个免费的，分散的社交网络Dapp，它保护和尊重人类社交互动的多样性和多样性，并且即将在EOS平台上推出。
